pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.35: See Kd 18:1.2.22 for the correct interpretation of this line.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.5.1: Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū can be read either as referring to two monks, Mettiya and Bhūmajaka, or as a group of monks led by these two. I have not been able to find any clear evidence that it refers to a group, and so I prefer the more straightforward reading that it only refers to the two monks.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:3.4.2: Sp.1.387: No kappetīti na saddahati, “No kappeti: he does not believe.”
